scripts.build: echo 'Installing code-server...' && curl -fsSL https://code-server.dev/install.sh | sh && echo 'Build complete - code-server installed'
scripts.start: export PATH="$HOME/bin:$PATH" && echo 'Starting code-server on port '$PORT'...' && code-server --bind-addr=0.0.0.0:$PORT --auth=password --password=${CODE_SERVER_PASSWORD:-vsc123} --disable-telemetry --disable-update-check .
